Anybody know why after I use Gparted to format my second raptor 36g to ext 4, I see it mounted but if I try to transfer something to it I get permission denied errors?
what filesystem is the drive? and how did you mount it?
it is ext4 and it mounted automatically after I restarted

for linux native filesystems the directories must be 'owned' by the user you wish to access teh device..  use fstab to mount it where you want, then either chown the mountpoint, or chown any directroies on teh drive.
okay thanks, I will give that a shot
